prompts.categorize: Categorize this customer query into one of: Technical, Billing, General. Query: {query}
prompts.sentiment: Analyze the sentiment of this query as positive, negative, or neutral. Query: {query}
prompts.handle_technical: Provide a {tone} technical support response. Query: {query}
prompts.handle_billing: Provide a {tone} response about billing or payment. Query: {query}
prompts.general: Provide a {tone} response to this general query. Query: {query}
prompts.escalate: I understand this requires special attention. A support representative will contact you shortly.

custom_requirements: Key UX Features:      One-Tap Reorder          Reorder your favorite meals with a single tap on the home screen.      Smart Search with Filters          Search by cuisine, price, delivery time, or dietary preference (vegan, gluten-free, etc.).      Live Order Tracking          Real-time map view of your driver and delivery ETA.      Personalized Home Feed          AI-curated restaurant suggestions based on past orders, time of day, and mood tags.      Simple Checkout          Fast checkout with Apple Pay, Google Pay, or saved card. Option to split bills.      Loyalty & Rewards Program          Earn points with every order, unlock exclusive deals, and get free delivery vouchers.      Dark Mode & Accessibility Options          Toggle-friendly interface for night-time use and accessible design for visually impaired users.      Interactive Restaurant Menus          Swipe through high-quality food images, see customer reviews, and tap to customize dishes.      Order Scheduler          Plan your meal deliveries ahead—great for lunch breaks or late-night cravings.      Multi-language Support      Choose from different languages based on region or user preference.
